title: Classic Steel Watch
summary: Steel watchface for round and square watches
developerAddress:
185 Estancia Dr. Unit 228
San Jose Ca 95134
description: A beatifully crafted classic watchface with smooth second had move and designed both for circular and square devices.All designs belong to Selin Sargut slnsargut@gmail.com http://selinsargut.wix.com/portfolio?fb_ref=DefaultPlease allow some time for watch face to appear on your android wear after installation.Feel free to contact for feedback or report bugs on new not tested devices.
descriptionHTML:
A beatifully crafted classic watchface with smooth second had move and designed both for circular and square devices.
All designs belong to Selin Sargut slnsargut@gmail.com
http://selinsargut.wix.com/portfolio?fb_ref=Default

Please allow some time for watch face to appear on your android wear after installation.
Feel free to contact for feedback or report bugs on new not tested devices.
comments: Perfect Perfectly works on my LG urbane. Should be revized on shadows
Works well Great, it works well on my Moto 360 2nd. Thank you.
Very boring Plain boring watchface , no customization and it looks terrible
